Articles.Content:
Hey, I was wondering, Is there a mod that saves the crew as well when you click "Save"?

I guess I could just put all the other kerbals in some capsules in a field or something, but I would really like to be able to just set a crew to a ship.

I know it sounds silly, but sometimes I like to assign crew to missions, for bases and suchlike.
Not exactly what you asked for, but look at RealRoster
